mapper.insert: insert into orders(oid, mid, orderdate, remark) values(seqoid.nextval, #{mid}, sysdate, #{remark})
mapper.select: select max(oid) as maxnum from orders
mapper.insert: insert into orderdetails(odid, oid, pnum, qty, remark) values(seqodid.nextval, #{oid}, #{pnum}, #{qty}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update products set stock = stock - #{stock} where num = #{num}
update members set mpoint = mpoint + #{mpoint} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select p.num pnum, p.name pname, od.qty, p.price, p.point, p.image from (orders o inner join orderdetails od on o.oid=od.oid) inner join products p on od.pnum = p.num and o.oid = #{oid}
